content: I opened the rust project's folder in vscode and it no longer shows those hint and tooltip on hover. Works fine if I hover on files for smaller project. Anyone know what's going on? :sweat_smile:

You might have to wait a little for it to load (try running cargo check and wait until it finishes). It's actually ./x.py check, IIRC, and you can also configure it to be used for "check on save" if you want. https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/6524 might also help here (so that analysis works for the private rustc crates).
after almost an hour of fetching and building bunch of stuff, yeah it works :sweat_smile: :congratulations:
it might be a good idea to disable loadOutDirsOnCheck in the rust repo :thinking: Also, did you see the tips in the dev guide?
didn't know that guide, looks very helpful!
